name: Mimic Sleuth
description:
The royal treasure chamber is infested with mimics! And nobody wants to be the one to figure out what is chest and what mimic. So the king has issued one random citizen to do the dirty work... and that citizen would be you.

Learn about the art of chest making and about the behaviour of mimics to unmask any mimic you come across. Study the metals, the types of keyholes and chest variants to make the perfect assessment. Because if you don't, your life will be short-lived.

Made in a week for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1 "It Is Not Real". I hope the English is okay because I don't know any native speakers for proof reading...
